{{cpp/error/error_code/title|assign}}
{{cpp/error/error_code/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|1=
void assign( int val, const error_category&amp; cat ) noexcept;
}}

Replaces the contents with error code value {{c|val}} and corresponding category {{c|cat}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|val|platform-dependent error code value to assign}}
{{par|cat|error category corresponding to {{c|val}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
